long_description: The large Timbuk2 Crater Laptop Sleeve provides ventilated protection and carrying convenience for most 15 in. laptop computers. "Crater" holes help circulate air to keep your laptop cool while it's in the sleeve. Fully padded main compartment features an L-shaped zipper for easy access to your laptop; design lets you keep your laptop in the sleeve when you go through airport security. The Timbuk2 Crater Laptop Sleeve is constructed with high-density foam and rugged nylon to deliver solid protection and durability. Closeout.
short_description: The large Timbuk2 Crater Laptop Sleeve provides ventilated protection and carrying convenience for most 15 in. laptop computers.
